body: So, just a chain of events for historical purposes: Megu posted a ruqqus version of toxic reddit user, but I saw him mention that he didn't know how to draw foam coming out of the mouth. I took this as a little personal challenge to see if I could illustrate foam coming out of the wojak's mouth. Given feedback I apparently successfully did, and it just sorta took off from there, with suggestions to add in a background of cringe murmur MLP trash, and my own creativity. Hey @CrystalVulpine what was that about adult males having no creativity?
